review: This have to be one of the Experince Ever, Thank you Wifey
It was a great trip to Siem Reap with friends, i really enjoyed exploring the old temples!
The best travel agency. The planning and timing by the agency was great.!
I was extremely satisfied with Derleng Tours. Mr. Dara, the owner, has proven to be very courteous and helpful from the very beginning.
Thank you Dara Sur, Thuna and Pissa. We will have no hesitation in recommending you to our friends. Thank you, thank you, thank you!
My mom and i are very happy with our trip, and with the help of Mr T and Derleng Tours, for making my mom's birthday her best one yet!!.
All in all, a great tour company. Great communication via email and efficiency throughout. Highly recommended!
What more can I say, this is truly a professional organization who can make any trip to the Siem Reap area a real treat
I would like to thank Mr Dara (lucky for us)who we met in Kool hotel when we arrived from PP who personally assisted us.
Best if you go in a large group, because we were charged USD70 for the whole-day use of the van regardless of how many we were..
Mr John is our tour guide. He is very knowledgable and English is good. He explains all the history very well
Going from the border to Ban Phe, the driver spoke no English (had substantial difficulty communicating need for toilet breaks) and did not know how to get to the pier
Very committed service with proper follow-up. Service provided as per their schedule with a hassle free journey... thanks to ITS tours and travels for providing services.
The best travel agency. The planning and timing by the agency was great. Accommodation was also good at 3star hotels. The package was reasonable. Thanks to Travelling bud.
Emperor Tours organisation was lacking. These may seem small details, but were it not for our good group, would have spoiled the holiday.
Derleng Tours is the tour based agency provide everything they mention in their packages. Great guider and professional.
Pissa's English and passion for Khmer history is astounding. He not just knows the ancient history but really loves the religious and artistic beauty this country offer
Thank you Dara Sur, Thuna and Pissa. We will have no hesitation in recommending you to our friends. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Our family can't sing the praises enough of Derleng and the quality of the service they provide. If you want to see, learn and understand a bit of this lovely country this is the company for you
My mom and i are very happy with our trip, and with the help of Mr T and Derleng Tours, for making my mom's birthday her best one yet
Get Mr T to bring you around if you ever come to Siem Reap. He is awesome at what he does!
It is advisable to have a guide for the temple tours so that the guide can explain and you will have a deeper understanding of the history of the temples and the culture of the country..
Both driver and guide were friendly and professional. Every question was answered, every itinerary request met.
Before booking, you can browse through their website which will give you some ideas of the itinerary of what the tour will provide.
We were glad we did as we had an amazing time and the temples which we visited are full of history and the floating village/country side very scenic.
My husband and I had just returned from an amazing 4-day trip to Siem Reap and would highly recommend the place for a short getaway
I would highly recommend Derleng based on our experience with Veasna and Kol!!
We booked a two-day day tour with Darleng Tours on the Sunday before the trip. The two day itinerary was exactly what we were looking for, seeing that we were only in Siem Reap for 4 days 3 nights
The trip was so amazing, thanks to Veasna and Thunna for the wonderful two days. I would definitely recommend this tour to people visiting Siem Reap for the first time
Thank you Derleng, and especially Veasna and Thunna, for making us fall in love with the temples of Angkor. We canâ€™t wait to go back again!
Derleng truely deserve their high rating. The good feedback they are receiving is spot on.
Bring a passport photo for the visa. If you forget, like I did, they will charge $1US to photocopy your passport. I did not see any currency exchange at Customs (but then, I had my $US already
A few tips: Bring $US cash with you. The currency of choice is US. You will save time by bringing a few small bills -$1, $5, $10 with you, and then exchanging your currency later during your stay,!
We would definitely recommend Derleng Tours and specifically the dynamic Chon and Tuna duo!.
T was a very special tour guide, so kind, caring, informative, and funny, we absolutely loved him and miss him already! If you're planning a trip to Siem Reap, book Derleng.

Thy speaks fantastic English with an American accent and had no trouble understanding our Australian accents. He was keen to learn new words and phrases, he was extremely knowledgeable, personable, friendly, and truly imparted his love for his country.
. From the very beginning Derleng were accommodating and helpful with our requests. So big thumbs up on that bit.
Hotels arrangement was great. It may not be 5 Stars Serving but the WARM HOMELY atmosphere render from the staffs was excellent. And the rooms are nicely decorated..
My husband and I booked a two day tour of the temples and a private transfer from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh.
Only one bank will would work for our American ATM card (UCB-union commercial bank)-across the street from the children's hospital, and we were limited to how much cash we could withdraw.
Cambodia was one of the most beautiful places I have visited, and the people were very nice and gracious.
I felt like I was treated very well by this company and would use them again.!
Our travel guide Pissa showed me the best places to make pictures. I made 700 pictures in two days.
This was one of the best tours we ever had. Our travel guide Pissa and our driver Kol were very friendly, polite and very experienced.
I felt like I was treated very well by this company and would use them again.
We did not use Derleng for a tour. Instead we booked overland transportation from Bangkok to Siem Reap and back again..
This was one of the best tours we ever had. Our travel guide Pissa and our driver Kol were very friendly, polite and very experienced
I would highly recommend Derleng Tours to anyone. Well done guys!

Our second day was a boat trip to kampong pluke and the floating village really interesting to see a different world and we enjoyed a paddle boat through the flooded forest. Mr. kol was our driver he was a very good driver and very pleasant
We also stayed at Sanctuary in Battambang and that was a wonderful place to relax.

I enjoyed a full 1.5 day tour organized to my specification by Sip Chamnan. His English was quite good, he's fully licensed, and he was knowledgeable about all of the many sights to see around Siem Reap
I can recommend Derleng with no hesitation. I put the entire success of our Cambodia trip in their hands, and they came through with flying colours.
We would highly recommend this company to anyone who is looking for a great tour guide and driver with a service from heart and make your visit a memorable one..
Our tour was perfect and we both enjoyed it very much. Our tour guide Rithy and driver thunna were special and very helpful
Visited the palm sugar making and had a chance to climb the palm tree (high rank position job). When we first landed in Siem Reap
The Apsara buffet dance is a MUST NOT MISS out. Unique dance that must be watch and a buffet that have varieties of Cambodian food to try.
My family and I had an awesome short trip in the Angkor city, thanks to Mr. Tea @ Thal Sopharithy
It wasn't fancy like the massive (and very pricey) 5 Stars, and it was in a somewhat sketchy back alley, but the hotel was great for us and the price was very reasonable.
Overall, I would give these guys 10 stars if I could. Book them now and you won't have to worry about a thing the whole time you're in Siem Reap
Whomever you do decide to travel with, if anybody, Cambodia is a place that you will never forget. Enjoy!
